snippet.title: Disco Simulator Trailer
snippet.description:
Disco Simulator by GamesIncubator
Add to #Steam wishlist
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1226970

1 BUILD YOUR OWN CLUB
Disco Simulator is a game where you play the role of the owner and manager of a music club. Buy equipment, sound system, lighting and decide on the appearance of your club. Make money on party people and have fun with them!

2 BUY WAREHOUSE
Buy a warehouse and turn it into a music club. You have several abandoned warehouses of various sizes at your disposal. Get levels and  reputation, which allow you to develop your club.

3 AUDIO EQUIPMENT
Equip your club with the best quality audio system. You can choose from over 20 different types of audio players such as: turntables, cd players, digital players, MIDI controllers and effectors. Depending on the club's equipment, you have the chance to increase the club's reputation and increase the entry fee.

4 SOUNDSYSTEM
The sound system has massive impact on the overall party experience. Equip your club with the best sound system, to minimize the risk of failure during events. You can choose from over 15 types of stage sound system. Set the wall of bass that will blow your guests minds!

5 VISUAL SHOW
Put massive LED screens, lighting equipment and lasers to create an epic party. Equip the club with the best quality visual equipment to run the craziest party in town.

6 SET UP A BAR
Set up a bar, it will make you tons of money on selling drinks during the party. Set bar prices, promote drinks through Happy Hour, and increase number of seats at the bar. By increasing the sale of alcohol you will make more money. You can also improve your club's reputation by increasing  interventions of club's bodyguards.

7 CHILLOUT ZONE AND LAVATORY
Chillout zone in your club is a place of conversation and relax for party people. Equip your club with spacious sofas and armchairs to increase guests comfort and relaxation. Provide clean toilets to reduce queues at the club.

8 GUESTS SELECTION
Stand in front of your club and decide who can get in and who can not. Your choices affect the club's reputation and the type of guests visiting your club. Show bodyguards that you don't want thieves and perverts at the club - unless you want to party with them ...

9 JOIN THE PARTY!
Have fun at the parties you create. Control party people by checking if they don't provoke others, do not argue or run their monkey businesses without your permission.
